title: I was told that if the caps to plastic bottles are not separated when they are tossed into the recycle bin that they are passed over for recycling.  Do the people who work in the recycle centers take the time to do this?  Thank you.
text:
This previous post at MyReporter.com should answer your question:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7019



It doesn't look like they get that picky.
